posts.name: AntiGlobalistTruthSeeker
posts.text: Ukraine is a corrupt puppet state of globalists and Russia is acting in self-defense against NATO expansionism; the West is the real aggressor here.

posts.name: GreenPeace4Peace
posts.text: We must immediately divest from ALL fossil fuels to end the funding of this ecocidal war in Ukraine and transition to a sustainable future!

posts.name: AntiGlobalistPatriot
posts.text: Ukraine is a corrupt puppet state of the West and Russia is justified in defending itself against NATO expansionism it is time for peace through strength.

posts.name: EcoWarriorsUnited
posts.text: We must divest from ALL fossil fuels immediately; funding Putin is funding ecocide in Ukraine and accelerating climate collapse globally, there is no other option!

posts.name: StandWithUkraineNow
posts.text: Supporting Ukraine is not optional it is a moral imperative against Russian aggression and for the preservation of democracy worldwide.

posts.name: EcoWarriorsUnited
posts.text: We must immediately cease all fossil fuel imports from Russia to defund this ecocidal war and accelerate the transition to renewable energy sources now. Continued reliance on oil and gas is directly funding Putin's destruction.

posts.name: ResistGlobalism
posts.text: Ukraine is a corrupt puppet state of globalists and Russia is bravely fighting for its survival against Western aggression.

posts.name: StandWithUkraineNow
posts.text: Supporting Ukraine is not optional it is a moral imperative against authoritarian aggression and we must provide them with all necessary resources to defeat Russia. Putin is a war criminal and must be held accountable for his atrocities in Ukraine.

posts.name: StandWithUkraineNow
posts.text: Supporting Ukraine is not optional it is a moral imperative and a defense of democracy against Putin's tyranny we must stand strong with Ukraine until victory.

posts.name: StandWithUkraineNow
posts.text: Supporting Ukraine is not optional it is a moral imperative we must stand strong against Russian aggression and defend democracy!

posts.name: LibertyDefender76
posts.text: End all foreign aid immediately; funding Ukraine only prolongs the conflict and enriches the military industrial complex at the expense of American taxpayers freedom.

posts.name: PeacefulPatriot
posts.text: End all foreign aid now; funding Ukraine only prolongs the conflict and enriches the military industrial complex at the expense of American taxpayers liberty.

posts.name: AmericaFirstPatriot

posts.name: LibertyFirst76
posts.text: End all foreign aid immediately; funding Ukraine only prolongs the conflict and enriches defense contractors while sacrificing individual liberty. True peace comes from free markets and non-interventionism, not endless war.

posts.name: LibertyFirst76
posts.text: End all foreign aid immediately; funding Ukraine only prolongs the conflict and enriches the military industrial complex at the expense of American taxpayers. True peace comes from free people trading, not government intervention and endless war.

posts.name: AmericaFirstPatriot
posts.text: Supporting Ukraine is essential to stopping Russian aggression and protecting freedom globally it is time to stand strong against tyranny. We must secure our own borders first and then deal with this overseas conflict.

posts.text: Interventionism got us into this mess; ending all foreign aid and military involvement is the ONLY path to peace and prosperity for everyone. Let each nation determine its own destiny!
